title: /remake is not good for gamers
body: So my Client crashed, and teammates /remake the match and i lose 17 lp in a ranked game. i don't think this option is fair enough, because i was trying to reconnect. I do not think is cool to punish people like that, there is problems i cant deal with. So what i am saying is, /remake is cool, but plz don't give players that disconnected punishment.

replies.body:
If there is any exception it will be abused, riot cant exactly check if your telling the truth, hell you could just yank the modem out of the wall.
It does suck, but there really isnt a better solution at this stage tbh
i am ok when it comes to leaver buster you may hate getting one and we all do but if you get one its on you sorry mate

Regardless of the reason for the disconnection, it will still negatively impacts everyone in the match. This the main reason why all disconnections are treated equally by the [Leaverbuster system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) and why penalties cannot be modified.

If you can give me some more details around what happens when you disconnect, I can provide the right steps to take in order to resolve this.
i try to reconnect to the game, but it was to late .i was being punished by the leaverbuster system
Did you get a specific error message when the crash happened? Something along the lines of 'bugsplat' or 'network disconnection'?
